english: I need to buy a ticket to Warsaw.
Can I see your passport, please?
Is this the way to the hotel?
polish: Czy to jest droga do hotelu?
phonetic: t͡ʂɨ tɔ jɛst ˈdrɔɡa dɔ xɔˈtɛlu

english: I would like a discount, please.
Can you help me find the pharmacy?
polish: Czy możesz mi pomóc znaleźć aptekę?
phonetic: t͡ʂɨ ˈmɔʐɛʂ mi ˈpɔmut͡s ˈznalɛɕt͡ɕ apˈtɛkɛ

english: I need to see a doctor.
Can you show me the way to the hospital?
polish: Czy możesz pokazać mi drogę do szpitala?
phonetic: t͡ʂɨ ˈmɔʐɛʂ pɔˈkazat͡ɕ mi ˈdrɔɡɛ dɔ ʂpiˈtala

english: Is it going to rain tomorrow?
